attributes.title: Don’t use

attributes.review: As a long time Trump supporter and America lover i was thrilled to find out our president had an app, but when i opened the app i was VERY DISAPPOINTED. The app glitched every second and the screen would go black. I think that as our president he should manage his app better. Ive been seriously considering not voting for him this campaign because of this, i think this country deserves a president who knows how to run an app🤦🏼‍♀️🇺🇸 #nottrump2020 #verydisappoint #notvoteforhimanymore
attributes.title: Trump, please do better.

attributes.review: Ain’t no reason you should be president hahaha
attributes.title: Kenya 2020

attributes.review: Okay if I could leave a zero star review I would DONT DOUBT ME. So I was soooooooooooooooiooooooooooo excited when I found out let’s just not say his name had an app but IT TOOK A WHOLE WEEK TO DOWNLOAD🤨😡 and when it finally downloaded I was so happy😋 but then when I got into the app it asked me if it could send me notifications 😠like are you serious so I pressed of course😃 but then after I did that I saw fudging rat on my screen I was so scared I literally grabbed my holy water and prayyyyeddd that my phone wasn’t traumatized that I downloaded this app I’m sorry phone I’m sooooo sorrry THIS APPPP SUCKKKS DONT DOWNLOAD IT
